nodes.text:
The A-foreman or Alpha-foreman was the chief foreman at the Kuat Drive Yards construction docks.
Answering only to the head of KDY, there was only one A-foreman and hundreds of B-supervisors. The loyalty of the A-foreman, as well as all KDY employees, went unquestioned by Kuat of Kuat around 4 ABY.
